Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Thick Fat 7 A layer of thick fat halves the damage the Pokémon takes from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
18 Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
36 Gooey 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
54 Dry Skin 6 Rain and Water-type moves restore HP. Sunlight and Fire-type damage hurt more.
72 Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
90 Slush Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
100 Unburden 8 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 02 Pickup 2 The Pokémon may pick up the items, both during and outside of battle.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 1 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 19 Liquid Voice 5 All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
Disc 28 Snow Warning 9 The Pokémon summons a hailstorm when it enters a battle.
Disc 32 Frozen Body 6 Contact with the Pokémon may cause frostbite.
Disc 61 Unburden 8 Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon's held item is used or lost.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Anticipation 3 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Bare Hands 6 Boosts the base power of the Pokémon's attacks if they are not holding an item.
Bland Skin -4 Halves the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat.
Cold-Blooded 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Cute Charm 4 Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
Dry Skin 6 Rain and Water-type moves restore HP. Sunlight and Fire-type damage hurt more.
Early Bird 4 The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
Friend Guard 2 Reduces damage done to allies.
Gooey 6 Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
Guts 6 It's so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Ice Body 4 The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
No Guard 8 The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
Predictable -4 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Refrigerate 8 Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Run Away 1 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Simple 8 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Sleet Spit 5 The Pokémon generates a hailstorm when it's hit by an attack.
Slush Rush 6 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
Snow Cloak 6 Boosts evasiveness in a hailstorm.
Thick Fat 7 A layer of thick fat halves the damage the Pokémon takes from Fire- and Ice-type moves.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Bones -4 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
Wimp Out 4 The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Wonder Skin 5 Makes status moves more likely to miss.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
